name: FogCloud
0:
”Alexa, turn off outlet”
”Alexa, turn off light”
”Alexa, turn on outlet”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Skill introduce:
You can control your smart devices by voice after binding your MXHIPSmartHome app account with this skill.
before that:
1. complete your Echo binding with Alexa app
2. complete your smart device binding with MXCHIPSmartHome app
then:
"enable" this skill with the password and loginname you used in MXCHIPSmartHome app. Now you can control smart device by your voice.
